description: man standing at bottom of image, holding a long blowgun to his mouth and aiming vertically at a dragonfly at TC of the image; dark blue damask border; decorative ties with green and brown geometric design; top and bottom are tan silk; dark wood roller; woven hanging cord; inner box and lid of tan paper with label on top; newer outer box of brown wood with lid
inscription: writing in Japanese on inner box lid; note taped to inner box lid: Ink & Color on paper / Hunting with a blow / gun / 1045 / Not signed / 26; label on end of inner box: 1045 / 15 x 51; paper tag on hanging cord: #43692 [Japanese writing on front and back]
markings: two red seals in BR of image and one on inner box lid; sticker on L roller knob: JAPAN [Japanese writing]
medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper
signed: red seals 〇〇 and 知角
title: Chinese man hunting a dragonfly with a blowgun
